name: Axe, Bow and Staff
description:
Axe Bow and Staff is a fast-paced side-scroller which combines ARPG with running game.

You play up to 3 different heroes at the same time, control them to run different lanes, use different abilities, to conquer different obstacles.

Features:
  • Joyful pixel art and chiptunes.
  • Funny dialogues.
  • Upgrade, items and other RPG systems.
  • Procedurally generated arena level.
  • Local co-op (supports up to 3 gamepads).
  • Online multiplayer co-op(*).

(*) to add in the future version.

Controls:Single player:

Mouse left click - First skill

Mouse right click - Second skill

W/S - Move up/down

A/D - Deactivate/Activate

1/2/3 - Switch to Axe/Bow/Staff

Hold mouse left button to drag hero.

Multiple players:

Gamepad button 0 - First skill

Gamepad button 1 - Second skill

Gamepad axis Y - Move up/down

Gamepad axis X - Deactivate/Activate
